title: EmployeeType
description: The information about a person and their relationship as an employee.

SpecialClassificationTypeArray.description: A special classification of the Employee e.g. a VIP, Owner, Highly Compensated, Stock Owner, Executive, Officer, etc.

code.description: A code indicating the special classification.

indicator.description: An indicator of the special classification.

percentage.description: The percentage of a person's allocation that is considered the special classification.

laborBargainingUnitMemberIndicator.description: An indicator that an employee is a memeber of a labor bargaining unit.
